name: Sil-Bond RTV-4500 (Acetoxy)
description: Sil-Bond RTV-4500 (Acetoxy) is a one component room temperature vulcanizing RTV acetoxy cure silicone sealant and adhesive that has been chemically formulated for high strength adhesion. When fully cured, this unique VOC compliant formula offers UV stability and excellent adhesion to form waterproof and airtight bonds to metal, steel, tile, fiberglass, ceramic, glass, aluminum, painted surfaces, wood, plywood, marble, plus many other common substrates. This product is specifically formulated to offer all weather performance to meets today's Green Building Standards.
